auth.js Script¶

_dealWithReceivedJson(data, submittedName, event)¶

Callback used for dealing with loaded ‘getAllUsers’ JSON data in the process of submitting a username for authorisation.

Arguments:
  • data (string|Object) – the JSON data, if successfully loaded, or a string giving the error status if loading was unsuccessful.
  • submittedName (string) – the username submitted by the user, with possible modification made by previously called functions.
  • event (Object) – the event (default implementation: a “click” event) which triggered the username submission.
_submitClick(event)¶

Callback used for the submission trigger in the process of a user submitting a username for authorisation.

Arguments:
  • event (Object) – the event (default implementation: a “click” event) which triggered the username submission.
